attributes.action: Confirm that one can safely whistle-blow about the dangers of Covid injections.
attributes.additional_details:
MP’s are unwilling to get involved.
To learn from the past 3 years and protect the public we must have full transparency, open discussion and scientific debate. Most importantly medical staff and researchers must be able to ask questions and raise concerns. The evidence shows that questioning, or wanting to debate the side effects observed was silenced or censored. The Government must confirm immediately that one can safely whistle-blow and openly discuss the serious side effects.
attributes.background: Medical staff/doctors/researchers must be able to safely whistle- blow about the dangers of covid injections and be allowed to have open discussion without any threat, censorship, loss of job or reprimand. This must be confirmed by the Government in a written statement which is made public.

rejection.details: Whistleblowing legislation already applies to workers in the health sector. You can find out more about whistleblowing here: https://www.gov.uk/whistleblowing
